column4: hi there.  i want to dualboot ubuntu on my macbook. Can the installation re-size my disk and install or do I need to re-install osx aswell?
the installer will show a recommended partition scheme making use of free space on your drive. You can use this or do it manually.
You might need to configure the bootloader to show OSX
ah.  thanks.  all i wanted to know.  :)
